name: SmlWhrld
description:
SmlWhrld is a scale-based puzzle game.

Complete the levels by fitting the "WinCube" into the "Win Box" at the correct scale. Fastest time is scored on each level.

Made in 48 hrs for Ludum Dare 38. Please vote if you enjoyed the game!

SOURCE CODE

Web Player Instructions/Controls

  • Mouse 1 & 2 - Scale Player size up or down
  • F - Toggle Pickup item/cube
  • Q & E - Scale Picked Up Items up or down

PC/Standalone Controls

  • Mouse 1 & 2 - Scale Player size up or down
  • E - Hold to pickup item/cube
  • Mouse Scrollwheel - Scrolling scales held item up or down
